bibl.title: Constructing Jewish Identity in Ptolemaic Egypt: The Case of Artapanus.
bibl.note: Evaluates the criteria that are used in identifying a text as ""Jewish"". Applies these considerations to a related issue: Artapanus's presentation of Moses in his work entitled On the Jews.
